removeCols derive(distributeur = "vente directe",
		{Diffus/chantier} = iif( {Canal distribution}=="43", "Chantier", "Diffus"),
		{marque(SD/vaillant)} = iif({Org commerciale}=="1604", "SaunierDuval", "Vaillant")) ~> addCols
comptesap select(mapColumn(
		{Agence commerciale},
		Client,
		{Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> projection
projection aggregate(groupBy(Client,
		{Code postal}),
	{Agence commerciale} = max({Agence commerciale})) ~> dropDuplicade
removeCol1, dropDuplicade join({Code client} == Client,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> sapJoin
addCols select(mapColumn(
		{Org commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Code client} = {Recept de march},
		{Destinataire facture},
		Article = reference,
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		yearmonth,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		{Diffus/chantier},
		{marque(SD/vaillant)},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> removeCol1
sapJoin, atcDropDuplicate join({Diffus/chantier} == {Canal final}
	&& {Code postal} == code_postal_atc
	&& {marque(SD/vaillant)} == Marque,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinAtc
refAtc select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 aggregate(groupBy({Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		Marque,
		ATC,
		NomATC),
	Matricule = max(Matricule)) ~> atcDropDuplicate
joinAtc, associationoffre join({Document de vente} == Commande,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinAssociation
offre select(mapColumn(
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		{ATC performance} = CodeATC,
		canal = Canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 aggregate(groupBy(Offre,
		{ATC performance},
		canal),
	Responsable = max(Responsable)) ~> offreDropDuplicade
joinAssociation, offreDropDuplicade join({Référence Offre BA} == Offre
	&& {Canal final} == canal,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinOffre
setQteCA select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = {Org commerciale},
		marque_name = {marque(SD/vaillant)},
		canal_final = {Diffus/chantier},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		POSSAMidString = {Code client},
		reference = Article,
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		yearmonth,
		distributeur,
		{Code postal},
		{Agence commerciale} = {Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{ATC performance},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		no_offre = {Référence Offre BA},
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> removeCol2
joinOffre derive(ca_final = {CA facturé},
		qt_final = {Qté facturée},
		data_origin = "facturation") ~> setQteCA

		Documentation,
		Marque,
		Cible,
		{Périmètre},
		Levier,
		Canal,
		{Hiérarchie inclues},
		{Hiérarchies exclues},
		Type,
		{Valeur Annuelle}),
	{Libellé levié} = max({Libellé levié})) ~> uniqueLevier
YEARFILTER derive({Libellé levié} = Levier+"-"+Documentation+" "+Cible+" "+{Périmètre}+" "+iif({Valeur Annuelle}=="YES", "Annuel", "Mensuel")) ~> libelleLevier

source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		Article as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Durée_période} as string,
		{Période} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> prixmoyen
splitDuree derive(mois1 = toInteger(split( {Mois début}, "/")[1]),
		annee1 = split( {Mois début}, "/")[2],
		mois2 = toInteger(split( {Mois fin}, "/")[1]),
		annee2 = split( {Mois fin}, "/")[2],
		Distributeur = iif(WholeSalerID=='ancs - accueil négoce chauffage sanitaire','partedis',  iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'trva - tereva' )>0, 'tereva',    iif( (instr(WholeSalerID, 'dsc')>0)  || (instr(WholeSalerID, 'cedeo')>0 ) , 'dsc',     iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'vf' )>0, 'vf_confort',      iif(instr(WholeSalerID, 'sonac' )>0, 'sonac',WholeSalerID)))))) ~> splitAnneeMois
splitAnneeMois derive(toreplicate = iif (mois2 - mois1 <=0, 1 ,  mois2 - mois1+1)) ~> createArray
prixmoyen derive({Mois début} = split( {Durée_période} ,"-")[1],
		{Mois fin} = split( {Durée_période} ,"-")[2],
		WholeSalerID = lower(WholeSalerID)) ~> splitDuree
createArray derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(toreplicate)), #index )) ~> createLoop
createLoop foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Distributeur,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		{Période},
		{Mois début},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		toreplicate,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
DerivedColumn5 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		Distributeur,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		{Période},
		{Mois début},
		{Mois fin},
		mois1,
		annee1,
		mois2,
		annee2,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Flatten1 derive(dd = toInteger(dd) -1) ~> DerivedColumn5

source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> plateforme
cleansing filter({Canal distribution}==42 || {Canal distribution}==51) ~> keep42and51
keep42and51 derive(fact_filter1 = iif( instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yfar")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1),
		fact_filter2 = iif(instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yafb")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1)) ~> factureFilter
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Récept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerPlateforme
innerPlateforme select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
prixMoyen sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> sort
Select3 keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> addKey
addKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> previousID
addKey, renameToPrevious join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinPreviousRow
sort derive(prix_unitaire = {CA facturé}/{Qté facturée}) ~> prixUnitaire
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier}),
	{Qté facturée} = max({Qté facturée}),
		{CA facturé} = max({CA facturé})) ~> prixMoyen
prixUnitaire select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
previousID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPrevious
addKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextID
nextID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNext
joinPreviousRow, renameToNext join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNextRow
joinNextRow derive({Changement de période} = iif({previous Article}!=Article || {previous WholeSalerID}!=WholeSalerID || {previous Année civile}!={Année civile}, 
    1, 

    iif(abs(({previous prix_unitaire}-prix_unitaire)/{previous prix_unitaire})>0.1, 1, 0))) ~> changementDePeriode
changementDePeriode filter({Changement de période}==1) ~> changementDePeriodeFiltre
joinNewNextID derive({Durée_période} = iif(WholeSalerID=={previous WholeSalerID} && Article=={previous Article} && {Année civile}=={previous Année civile}
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Année civile}=={next Année civile}
    
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}))
    
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Année civile}=={next Année civile}
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile})))) ~> DureePeriode
facturation derive({Canal distribution} = toInteger({Canal distribution})) ~> cleansing
DureePeriode sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 filter(!isNull(WholeSalerID) || !isNull(Article) || !isNull({Année civile}) || !isNull({Mois calendrier}) || !isNull(prix_unitaire) || !isNull({Durée_période})) ~> dropNULL
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Récept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftPlateforme
leftPlateforme filter(isNull(HubSAPid)) ~> leftOuterPlateforme
leftOuterPlateforme aggregate(groupBy(Article,
		{Année civile}),
	prix_unitaire = mean({CA facturé}/{Qté facturée})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive({Durée_période} = "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}),
		join = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
plateforme aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID),
	HubName = max(WholeSalerHubID)) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate2 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select5 derive(join = 1) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2 join(DerivedColumn1@join == DerivedColumn2@join,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
dropNULL select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
Select6 derive({Période} = 1) ~> addperiod
Select7, averagePrix union(byName: true)~> Union1
factureFilter filter(fact_filter1==0 || fact_filter2==0) ~> facFilter
facturation derive(test = toString({CA facturé})) ~> DerivedColumn3
Sort2 keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> addNewKey
changementDePeriodeFiltre select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deletePreviousAndNext
deletePreviousAndNext sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort2
addNewKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextNewID
nextNewID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNextNew
addNewKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> previousNewID
previousNewID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPreviousNew
addNewKey, renameToPreviousNew join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNewPreviousID
joinNewPreviousID, renameToNextNew join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNewNextID
addperiod, Select7 join(Select6@WholeSalerID == Select7@WholeSalerID
	&& Select6@Article == Select7@Article,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 filter(isNull(Select7@WholeSalerID) || isNull(Select7@Article)) ~> Filter2
Filter2 select(mapColumn(
		Article = Select6@Article,
		prix_unitaire = Select6@prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période} = Select6@{Durée_période},
		WholeSalerID = Select6@WholeSalerID,
		{Période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> averagePrix
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TEMP_PRIX_PAR_PERIODE.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> dureePeriodeOutput

		yearmonth = substring(date_id,1,6),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> extractYearMonth
extractYearMonth derive(year = substring(date_id,1,4),
		yearmonth = substring(date_id,1,6)) ~> extractYearMonthh
extractYearMonthh derive(fact_filter = iif ( ({Type de facture} =='YFAR' && ({Motif commande}=='FAS')  ||  ( {Type de facture}=='YFAB' && {Motif commande}=='FAS' )) ,1,0)) ~> FactFilterc

		ca_cd_ = {CA cdé},

		cout_fabrication = {Cout fabrication},

		cout_standard_factur_ = {Cout standard facturé}) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn derive(year_month = substring(date_id,1,6)) ~> extractYearMonthc
extractYearMonthc filter(fact_filter==0 && !isNull(Article)) ~> FactFilter

getYearmonth derive(month = iif(lower(Mois)=="janvier", "01",      iif(lower(Mois)=="février","02",     iif(lower(Mois)=="mars", "03",      iif(lower(Mois)=="avril", "04",      iif(lower(Mois)=="mai", "05",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juin", "06",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juillet", "07",      iif(lower(Mois)=="août", "08",      iif(lower(Mois)=="septembre", "09",      iif(lower(Mois)=="octobre", "10",      iif(lower(Mois)=="novembre", "11",      iif(lower(Mois)=="décembre", "12", "0")))))))))))),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> monthToNumber
yearmonth filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Coopérative})) ~> cooperativenotNull
organisation filter(!isNull({Nom Coopérative})) ~> orgaCooperativeNotNull
orgaCooperativeNotNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Coopérative},
